Source/provenance for the PlantGrowthForm assignment. Values indicate whether the growth-form category was taken directly from the TRY categorical lookup table or derived via multi-source verification (see MULTI_AUTH).

Parameter value assigned/verified using multiple authoritative sources, including databases and peer-reviewed literature listed in Table 2 of the manuscript (e.g., African Plant Database, World Flora Online, GBIF/iNaturalist where relevant, and publications cited in the reference list). Used when TRY categorical information was missing, incomplete, or ambiguous.
